content: I think as we've noted before, some games like Redecor and Best Fiends are now being managed out of our headquarters in Herzliya, and there's no update there other than the teams continue to get up to speed and execute on their business plans. So I think what we're seeing is that it really is by genre category, so it's hard to impact an overall economy driving any one result, be that, obviously, the real strength throughout the casual portfolio, and there was great execution there in the quarter.
